content.body: I'm traveling tomorrow. Depending on punctuality, I might be able to join half-way through. If not, I have been mostly experimenting with different encoding schemes for "Scopes": https://github.com/ChromeDevTools/sourcemap-scopes-encoding. The tl;dr is that for a size increase of ~5-10% we can make the encoding 100% VLQ (binary) based and, more importantly, forwards compatible.
